name: Death's Head Jellyfish Venom
url: pfsrd://Bestiary 3/Monsters/Jellyfish/Deaths Head/Special Abilities/Poison/Deaths Head Jellyfish Venom

sections.body: If a creature fails two consecutive saving throws, its jaw locks, its tongue swells, and its lips pull back, making speech impossible. This condition ends when the Charisma damage is healed.
